issue.title: will the fastest task2 simulation log win?

content.raw: Really? For me i can literally just command valkyrie to barge into the door and that simple motion alone can pretty much get valkyrie right through it. Without the need to press the button. So for me i can easily just press button then barge through the doorway without waiting to get a faster time but idk if that's okay.
